what: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: Test data admiral family packages

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: provide one-stop-shop SDTM test data admiral family packages. includes datasets therapeutic area (TA)-agnostic (DM, VS, EG, etc.) well TA-specific ones (RS, TR, OE, etc.).

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: package available CRAN can installed running install.packages("admiraldata"). install latest development version package directly GitHub use following code:

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: test datasets sourced CDISC pilot project, datasets constructed ad-hoc admiral team. Please check Github repository detailed information regarding source specific datasets.

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: Datasets TA-agnostic prefixed admiral_ (e.g. admiral_dm). Datasets TA-specific prefixed admiral extension package derive (e.g. admiralonco_rs, admiralophtha_oe). Note: SDTM domain used multiple TAs, {admiraldata} may provide multiple versions corresponding test dataset. instance, package contains admiral_ex admiralophtha_ex latter contains ophthalmology-specific variables EXLAT EXLOC, EXROUTE exchanged plausible ophthalmology value.

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: Firstly, make GitHub issue repo planned updates tag @pharmaverse/admiral one development core team can sanity check request. two main ways extend test data: either adding new datasets extending existing datasets new records/variables. Whichever method choose, worth noting following: Programs generate test data stored dev/ folder. programs written standalone R script: packages need loaded given program, call library() start program (please call library(admiraldata)). packages likely need already specified renv.lock file, already installed keeping sync–can check entering renv::status() Console. However, may also wish install metatools ggplot2, currently specified renv.lock file. feel need install packages addition just mentioned, please tag @pharmaverse/admiral discuss development core team. created program dev/ folder, need run standalone R script, order generate test dataset become part {admiraldata} package, need build package. Following best practice, dataset stored .rda file whose name consistent name dataset: example, dataset dm renamed raw_dm saving raw_dm.rda; save dm raw_dm.rda subsequently load .rda file, dm (raw_dm) loaded global environment. programs dev/ stored within {admiraldata} GitHub repository, part {admiraldata} package–dev/ folder specified .Rbuildignore. run program dev/ folder, generate dataset written data/ folder, become part {admiraldata} package. names test datasets specified R/data.R, purpose generating documentation man/ folder.

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: Create program dev/ folder, named <name>.R, <name> SDTM domain name, (e.g. rs.R), generate test data output admiral_<name>.rda data/ folder. Use CDISC pilot data admiral_dm input program order create realistic synthetic data remains consistent domains. Note personal data used part package, even anonymized. Run program. Reflect update, specifying admiral_<name> R/data.R. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/.

title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: Rename source dataset raw_<name>, <name> SDTM domain name (e.g. rename ds raw_ds), save data/ folder raw_<name>.rda (e.g. save(raw_ds, file = "data/raw_ds.rda")). Create program dev/ folder, named update_<name>.R, load raw_<name>.rda, make updates, output admiral_<name>.rda data/ folder. Run program. Reflect update, specifying raw_<name> admiral_<name> R/data.R. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/.

what: admiraltemplate: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension — admiraltemplate-package
title: admiraltemplate: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension — admiraltemplate-package
text: toolbox programming Clinical Data Standards Interchange Consortium (CDISC) compliant Analysis Data Model (ADaM) datasets R. ADaM datasets mandatory part New Drug Biologics License Application submitted United States Food Drug Administration (FDA). Analysis derivations implemented accordance "Analysis Data Model Implementation Guide" (CDISC Analysis Data Model Team, 2021, https://www.cdisc.org/standards/foundational/adam/adamig-v1-3-release-package).
